data.title: Philip Rivers children: All his 9 children and their photos
data.meta_description: PHILLIP RIVERS CHILDREN have been a subject of discussion among his fans. Check out the footballer's children whom he shares with his beautiful wife Tiffany
data.text:
Philip Rivers is an American footballer famous for playing for teams like Indianapolis Colts and Los Angeles Chargers. The athlete is happily married to one wife, and they have a large family of nine kids. So, who are Philip Rivers children?

Celebrity children grow up under immense scrutiny from the media. However, their parents can make conscious efforts to keep them away from the glare and raise them in a normal environment. Recently, Philip Rivers children have been a subject of discussion among his fans. So, who are these children?

Philip Rivers' family

Rivers was born in December 1981 in Decatur, Alabama, to Steve and Joan Rivers. His father was the head coach of Decatur's High School football team, while his mother was a teacher. The football quarterback has a younger brother, Stephen Rivers, and a sister known as Anna Rivers.

The NFL player studied at Athens High School, where his interest in football started. Earlier on, he played basketball. His brilliance in the sport earned him a place at the North Carolina State University, after which his career took off.

Philip Rivers' wife

Philip is married to Tiffany Rivers, his junior high school sweetheart. The two tied the knot in 2001 while still at the university, and Philip was 19 years old at the time. Tiffany is also an alumnus of North Carolina State University. The details of her background and upbringing remain undisclosed. However, she owns a swimwear line called Hermoza.

How many babies does Philip Rivers have?

The lovely couple has a large family. So, how many kids does Philip Rivers have? Rivers and his wife have nine children together. Both Tifanny and Phillip come from families with three children each. When they got married, they decided not to put a number on the kids they would have.

Because of his many children, several people wonder, ''Are Philip Rivers' kids adopted?'' No, they are all his biological children. He adores his children and has stated that his wife and children mean everything to him. The couple has openly shared that they prefer to use the natural family planning method instead of oral contraceptives.

Rivers and Tiffany have seven girls and two boys. Surprisingly, Philip's mother and grandfather also came from families of nine children; seven girls and two boys. Here is a list of the athlete's children:

Halle Rivers

Halle is the couple's firstborn daughter. She was born while the two were still at the university and is approximately 19 years old. Halle is a college student, and her father describes her as quiet and strong, with leadership qualities for her siblings.

Caroline Rivers

Caroline is approximately 16 years old and is currently in high school. The second born and her father see the world differently, but they are also alike. Rivers has cited that she is a strong-willed go-getter. Like her father, Caroline is into sports and plays basketball.

Grace Rivers

Grace is Philip and Tiffanyâ€™s third-born daughter. She is like a blend of her parents and can effortlessly fit in almost any environment. The versatile young woman is approximately 15 years old and plays tennis and basketball.

Gunner Rivers

Gunner is Philip's firstborn son and fourth child, and he is about 13 years old. Rivers' son has his mom's temperament and his father's love for sports. He plays just about any sport, a passion he developed when he was much younger.

Sarah Rivers

Sarah is about 11 years old and is the middle child of all the Rivers children. According to her dad, she is the life of their conversations at home, with a big personality and a talkative nature. Sarah was not into any sport for a long time, but she recently started swimming after the family moved to Indianapolis and has been performing exceptionally.

Peter Rivers

Peter is the second son born to Tiffany and Philip. He is an organized young boy who loves to help his dad with activities in the home. The 10-year-old loves the outdoors and has an interest in hunting and fishing. He also loves laid back sports like baseball and golf.

Rebecca Rivers

Her family loves to call her 'Becca,' and she is one of her father's greatest fans. She is about seven years old and loves to fix stuff. Additionally, Becca is also strong-willed, a trait her dad believes can lead her to do brilliant things with herself.

Clare Rivers

Clare shares a birthday with Rebecca but is two years younger than her. She is approximately five years old, and her dad suspects that her athletic talent will come out in years to come, although she has done gymnastics.

Anna Rivers

Anna is the last born of the Rivers family born in 2019. The little angel did not walk until she was 16 months old. At her tender age, Anna has a huge personality and is a source of joy and laughter for the entire household. Additionally, she is a book lover.

What NFL player has the most kids?

Football players and their personal lives are frequently being discussed online. However, most of them have children and families who depend on them. According to Ranker.com, some of the players with the most children are Antonio Cromartie, who has 14 children. Six of these are with his wife, Terricka Cason.

Willis McGahee has 10 children from eight women, while Travis Henry has 11 children with 10 different women.

Philip Rivers children are a significant part of his life and career. He enjoys an intimate and unique relationship with each one of them. Rivers and his wife have not capped the number of children they intend to get. So, the world will be watching if they will increase their big, beautiful family.

Tuko.co.ke published the 15 biggest NFL players in history. Most of these athletes have almost double the average sportsman's weight. Their average height is 6 feet and 2 inches, and they weigh over 250 pounds. So, who are the biggest NFL players in history?

Aaron Gibson, weighing 410 pounds, tops the list of heavyweights. He is the biggest footballer in the last century and played between 1999 and 2004 for Detroit Lions, Dallas Cowboys, and Chicago Bears. Other big-bodied players include Terrell Brown, weighing 403 pounds; Nate Newton, who weighs 401 pounds; and Bryant McKinnie, who weighs 386 pounds.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
